message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200.  I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable to you.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $120.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $200 is my bottom line. I believe it's a fair price for the value it provides. If you're still interested, let me know.
